descriptionHtml:
[center]
[font=Georgia][size=6][u][b][color=#351C75]Mage of Death[/color][/b][/u]
[color=#d8d8d8][color=#ffffff]Vendeatha[/color] 0.1
[/color][/size][/font]
[img width=705,height=397]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82828-2-1490618233.png[/img]
[size=5]
Hello! Wut's up! first of all thanks to all people who downloaded
and play with my first follower i am glad with that and i hope you enjoy playing with her as your combat partner, anyway this is a mini update for Vendeatha
i only re-sculpt her face and re-make her skills. reason why i re-sculpt her face
because she looks too young to be a "mage of death" so i decided to re-sculpt
her to make more matured looking woman and for the skills i decided to re-make
it cuz the old one looks like a water balloon popping out in the enemies so
i choose different effects to make more cooler and i add another skill for her.
thats it! good bye young Vendeatha

btw shes a trainer now and
i think shes alot more "OP" now than the old version
anyway thats the reason why shes a Mage of Death.

#supersaiyan
[/size]
[u][font=Georgia][color=#351C75][size=6][b]Basic Information[/b][/size][/color][/font][/u][font=Georgia]
[font=Arial][size=4][size=5][color=#0000ff][size=4]Race:[/size][/color][size=4] Nord
[color=#0000ff]Location:[/color] Temple of Divines (Solitude)
[font=Georgia][font=Arial][size=4][size=5][size=4][color=#0000ff]Marriable:[/color] Yes[/size][/size][/size][/font][/font]
[color=#0000ff]Class:[/color] Trainer Conjurer
[color=#0000ff]Combat Class:[/color] Human Magic
[color=#0000ff]Body type:[/color] CBBE
[color=#0000ff]Perks:[/color] Mix Mage Conjuration/Assassin/Marksman
[color=#0000ff]Spells:[/color] Custom Conjuration Spells (Update)
[color=#0000ff]Outfit:[/color] Dawnguard Vampire Outfit ([/size][/size][/size][/font][/font][font=Georgia][font=Arial][size=4][size=5][size=4][font=Georgia][font=Arial][size=4][size=5][font=Georgia][font=Arial][size=4][size=5][size=6][font=Georgia][font=Arial][size=5][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259]Remodeled Armor for CB...[/url])
[/size][/size][/font][/font][/size][/size][/size][/font][/font][/size][/size][/font][/font][font=Georgia][font=Arial][size=4][size=5][size=4][color=#0000ff]Weapon:[/color] [/size][/size][/size][/font][/font](No need)
[color=#0000ff]Level:[/color] 250 (Fix)
[color=#0000ff]Voice:[/color] Female Sultry[/size]

[color=#351C75][size=6][font=Georgia][b][u]Installation[/u]
[/b][font=Arial][color=#ffffff][size=5][size=4]Nexus Mod Manager
Manual
(if you are using the old version unistall it first using NMM/Manual
or overwrite it with the new one using NMM/Manual)[/size][/size][/color][/font][/font][/size][/color]
